s_synopsis: "The Ancient Art of War" is a real-time strategy game based on the very basic elements of war: unit types, formation, and strength. The game is set in ancient battle-style times before the use of gun powder, consisting of the three basic unit types of that period: the light armored but fast "barbarians", the heavily armored but slow "knights", and the ranged "archers". A fourth non-combatant unit type is also available: "spies", which is only available under certain campaign rule settings.
